attributes.title: Big booty j
attributes.review: I had to wait like 3 days for the app to download and after I opened it my phone detected malware and now my phone has a a lot of viruses and now my phone is now easily hack able and I got a new phone because the other one had to many viruses from this app that I could even use it. 100% do not recommend

attributes.title: Not working
attributes.review: After taking forever to download I finally opened the app and it kicked me off. Now every time I try to open the app it glitches and won’t let me sign in or do anything. I thought maybe it was just my phone but when I tried it on a better phone I was met with the same results.

attributes.title: makes me cry
attributes.review: this app has done so much to my mental health, in a negative way. I feel as though it needs to be taken off of the App Store to help the younger generation, and prevent this from happening to anyone else. I truly looked up to trump before this but now, with everything that is going on, his choices are hurting my soul. thank you for reading🥺

attributes.title: Sad!
attributes.review: My grand daughter downloaded this for me so I could see the Donald Trump videos. The news only shows the bad videos of the Donald Trump saying mean, stupid things and I want to see only the good ones. Disappointing. No good things on this app. I think it broke my phone. I had to delete everything on the iPhone after she installed the Donald Trump application. Sad!

attributes.title: disappointed
attributes.review: I got this app looking forward to being more informed with what is happening in politics, and to my dismay, everytime i tried to click on an article it would take me out of the app. I shouldn't have bothered after seeing the reviews, but i just saw for myself and well, don't get it, it's very poorly constructed.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: this app made my phone glitch so many times!!!!😡😡😡 i never got ANY updates on mr cheeto puffs campaigns. donald trump kept sending me really RUDE messages telling me he knows where i live!!! unbelievable!!!🙄🙄🙄 this app needs to be removed from the app store IMMEDIATELY. i can’t believe the president of the united states would allow the good citizens of this country to have this HORRIBLE TERRIBLE app!!!!🤦🏼‍♀️🤦🏼‍♀️😖😡 DO NOT GET THIS APP!!!!

attributes.title: I don’t know what’s up with this app
attributes.review: I downloaded the app and it was fine for about a week and then my phone just started to crash. I could be on Instagram or playing a game on my phone and my phone would crash completely. I would have to restart my phone every few minutes!

attributes.title: It glitches alotttt!!
attributes.review: even tho I’m not a fan of trump I downloaded it to see what he’s gonna be doin and stuff like that but every time I would try using it would glitch and kick me out of the app it would glitch to random pages and it wouldn’t work again I don’t like trump but this isn’t to get the app banned it just won’t work

attributes.title: Horrible, not worth getting
attributes.review: I’m a conservative republican who was invested in Rubio when trump first won, he took a couple years to win me over but when I got his app it kept on crashing, every time I opened the app I would hear a really loud noise and my whole screen would go black. I miss when apps did their job. Two thumbs down

attributes.title: Read this👏
attributes.review: I had a stroke watching this download and infect my phone, please patch this bug my head is starting to get a tumor from how much orange radiation this is giving off. Right when I open it, it starts glitching out and makes me have a seizure from our Cheeto president. It would be nice if you could make some fixes for these soon. THANK YOU!
attributes.userName: REVIEW ZOOM AS 1 STAR TRIST ME
